book.synopsis:
When a child is born, doctors and family encourage the new parents to provide three elements essential to the survival of the new born: love, nourishment, and protection. These same elements are vital for every new Christian as well. This workbook will help those new to the Christian faith find these basics for survival.
Getting a Grip on the Basics is a powerful study tool designed to help Christians find and experience the love of God, receive spiritual nourishment, and rest in the protective care of the Lord and His Word. Getting a Grip on the Basics will help ground new Christians in the fundamentals found in the Word of God and renew mature Christians in the basics of their faith.
